title: 6 Easy Steps to Get Dark Mode on TikTok

steps.title: Open TikTok.
steps.content: Open TikTok. This looks like music note with a black background. [1] X Research source If needed, you can install TikTok or create an account .

steps.title: Tap Profile on the bottom right.
steps.content: Tap Profile on the bottom right. This will take you to your profile tab. This is where you can edit your TikTok profile .

steps.title: Tap ☰ on the top right corner.
steps.content: Tap ☰ on the top right corner. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . Your Settings and privacy will open a new page.

steps.title: Tap Dark Mode.
steps.content: Tap Dark Mode . You can find this underneath the Content & Display section. It will be beside a crescent moon icon.

steps.title: Select Dark.
steps.content: Select Dark . If you have Dark Mode enabled in your device settings, you can also toggle on Use device settings . If you want to return to light mode, select Light .
